page.title: 14Young people in Lydlinch
page.content: There is very little for youngsters in the area. The school in Lydlinch closed many years ago and is now a private house.All children of school- age from Lydlinch,Stock and Kingstag have to travel by bus into Sturminster each day. There are no recreational facilities and the nearest youth clubs are at Stalbridge and Sturminster.Several attempts have been made to start some kind of club but have failed for lack of leaders. The youth who live there say they spend their spare time riding their bikes,fishing and watching television. Because of the lack of public transport they are all dependent on their parents to drive them to clubs,football matches etc. which they find very limiting.
